sentences.english: Because previous round the yellow card stops play, the Li Yi epicycle lifts a ban resurfaces .
sentences.chinese: 上輪因黃牌停賽，李毅本輪可謂解禁復出。

sentences.english: He said today that their release could have inflamed anti-American opinion.
sentences.chinese: 他今天稱照片的解禁可能激起反美的情緒。

sentences.english: Hopefully, the unblocking of text messaging in Iran is a sign that communication channels are returning to normal.
sentences.chinese: 希望伊朗短信解禁是溝通渠道恢復正常的標誌。

sentences.english: This service, Xisuoke lifts a ban resurfaces , but he has received a yellow card once more.
sentences.chinese: 此役，西索科解禁復出，但他再次領到了一張黃牌。

sentences.english: In addition to killing the DiggBar, Digg will also unban all previously banned domains.
sentences.chinese: 此外，Digg還將解禁以前被屏蔽的域名。

sentences.english: He made it his number-one priority when he was in office.
sentences.chinese: 當選後，他也把酒精飲品的解禁當做了第一要務。

sentences.english: This new atmosphere is not lifted shares in circulation as illusory.
sentences.chinese: 這種新氣象，並非因爲解禁股流通徒有虛名。

sentences.english: At this point, all sung in sea conditions limited the sale of the shares have been lifted.
sentences.chinese: 至此，中海海盛所有有限售條件股份均已解禁。

sentences.english: Firstly, this paper analyzes the price pressure from the circulation of restricted stock by theories.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先對限售股解禁的價格壓力進行理論探討。

sentences.english: In an open season the fishermen can land many fish.
sentences.chinese: 在漁獵解禁期，漁民們可捕到很多魚。

definition: to dump (selling abroad more cheaply than cost price at home)
